LanguageData.VPE_Healing.label: arcane healing
LanguageData.VPE_BlockBleeding.label: arcane stabilization
LanguageData.VPE_BlockBleeding.description: Magically-induced stasis that stops any bleeding.
LanguageData.VPE_Immunity.label: arcane immunity
LanguageData.VPE_Overshield.label: arcane overshield
LanguageData.VPE_Overshield.description: Magically-induced personal mana shield. Impenetrable by ranged projectiles.
LanguageData.VPE_GuardianSkipBarrier.label: guardian skipbarrier
LanguageData.VPE_GuardianSkipBarrier.description: Magically crafted defensive barrier that generates large amounts of arcane load in order to sustain itself.
LanguageData.VPE_RegrowLimbs.label: arcane regeneration
LanguageData.VPE_RegrowLimbs.description: Magically-induced tissue regeneration, which can close open wounds and regenerate missing body parts.
